box.glob¶

Functionality relevant to standard glob module.

box.glob.filtered_iglob(pattern, *, basedir=None, mode=None, sorter=None)¶

Yield the pathes matching a pattern.

Parameters:
  • pattern (str) – glob path pattern
  • basedir (str) – all pathes are relative to basedir
  • mode (str[files/dirs]) – filtering mode
  • sorter (function(pathes)) – function to sort pathes
Returns object:

paths generator

Function doesn’t support symbolic links.
